name: Radioactive Ant
description:
🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜

🐜              A whimsical game about an ant.                🐜

🐜         Science experiment gone HORRIBLY WRONG!          🐜

🐜      Take over the world or face total ANTnihilation!        🐜

🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜🐜

A game about a radioactive ant, that will eat anything. As long as it's  bite sized. Help Anttonio grow into the biggest boi, for his quest of world dominance!

                   

This is ANTtonio. He loves the outdours, sugar and mass genocide.

On your way to world domination you will meet lot's of enimies!

                   This is Beetlejuice. He's a bully that likes to steal ants their sugar.             This is Burb. Burb thinks you're a snack  This is Cathy. Cathy couldn't be bothered to be in the game. So she just stopped by to say hi.

And last but not least!

This is Raf. Raf loves to picknick in the park during his break from the lab
Developer team

Hey there everyone! We are Radioactive Ant Farm.

We are a two person team and are realy exited to share with you our first published game.  We are both studens from the Netherlands and you can find us on:

Art by @2dcat

code by Reinier (but has no instagram)

Because it's our first game that people on the internet will be able to play, we would love it if you could leave us some feedback in the comments or if you're shy  you can contact us on 

RAFconnect@outlook.com

Also join our Discord! https://discord.gg/692P83x
